source:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_00Kipih Jakkya has caught the scent of a story and needs help chasing it down.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_00※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ウルダハのキピ・ジャッキヤは、情報を集めているようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_01Kipih Jakkya, reporter for The Raven, tells you about a rumor that has been making its rounds of late. Apparently, an unusual black vehicle has been sighted in Thanalan along with peculiar mechanical soldiers, and there is growing concern that they may be some unknown type of Garlean weaponry. Kipih petitions your assistance to pen her story, and in case you should be amenable, she directs you to the vicinity of Black Brush, where the black vehicle was most recently sighted.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_01※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

キピ・ジャッキヤは、ザナラーンで目撃されている「奇妙な黒い乗り物」と「機械仕掛けの兵士」について情報を集めているようだ。中央ザナラーンので見渡そう。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_02<tab>At Black Brush, you come upon the black vehicle and its owner, a young man by the name of Noctis, who appears to be very far from home. His vehicle, the Regalia, has broken down, and he is relieved to learn that you know people who might be able to repair it. Soon after, you are joined by a crew from Garlond Ironworks and Cid himself, who promises to do his best with the Regalia. It then transpires that not only is Noctis acquainted with the mechanical soldiers, which he calls magitek troopers, but that both he and his automated adversaries hail from a world entirely different from your own. At Cid's suggestion, Noctis goes off to search for the magitek troopers in hopes of finding a way to return home. Follow Noctis and help him to defeat the magitek troopers by participating in the FATE “Like Clockwork” at the Clutch in central Thanalan.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA3D01 /var>で見渡し、奇妙な黒い乗り物と、黒尽くめの青年、ノクティスと出会った。その後、ガーロンド・アイアンワークスの社員や、シドたちとも合流し、レガリアを修理してもらうこととなった。シドから「機械仕掛けの兵士」についての目撃情報を得たノクティスは、早々にひとりで現場に向かってしまう。ノクティスを追い、中央ザナラーンの「クラッチ狭間」で発生しているF.A.T.E.「機械仕掛けの兵士」に参加して、機械仕掛けの兵士を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_03<tab>You and Noctis encounter a squad of magitek troopers and promptly vanquish them, along with a towering warmachina that had somehow managed to escape notice till now. The task thus concluded, Noctis turns his steps towards Black Brush, and you follow on his heels.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_03<tab>機械仕掛けの兵士を討伐した。中央ザナラーンの<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA3E01 /var>で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_04<tab>On the road, Noctis laments that while the enemies indeed came from his world, they offered no clues as to how he might make his way back. For now, the two of you decide to return to the Regalia before seeking further help.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA3E01 /var>で待機し、ノクティスと合流した。ひとまずレガリアの元に戻ることに決めた、冒険者とノクティス。中央ザナラーンの「シド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_05<tab>After hearing about your battle with the magitek troopers, Cid expresses his interest in examining their technology, and bids you salvage their parts from future encounters. These parts may be delivered to one of the Ironworks hands posted at Black Brush and in each of the three city-states. Just as Cid is explaining that he had moved the Regalia to keep it away from prying eyes, Kipih Jakkya arrives on the scene and begins bombarding Noctis with questions. In exchange for receiving help to find his way home, Noctis agrees to an exclusive interview, and he sets out for Ul'dah with Kipih.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_05<tab>シドと話した。話の最中に、キピ・ジャッキヤがやってきて、矢継ぎ早にノクティスを質問攻めにするも、元の世界へ戻れるよう、情報収集を協力してくれると申し出る。ウルダハへ戻ったふたりを追い、ウルダハの「キピ・ジャッキヤ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_06<tab>Arriving in Ul'dah at the interview's conclusion, you learn that Noctis had been traveling with his comrades on his way to meet his beloved fiancée. Satisfied with her harvest, Kipih reiterates her promise to help Noctis find the answers he seeks. At that moment, she receives a call from one of her colleagues, and turning back to you excitedly, she bids you and Noctis make ready for a journey on the trail of a hopeful lead.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SEQ_06<tab>キピ・ジャッキヤと話した。記者仲間にも情報収集を依頼したところ、さっそく有力情報が舞い込んできた。準備が整ったら、改めてキピ・ジャッキヤに話しかけるとしよう。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_TODO_00<tab>Investigate the designated area in central Thanalan.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_TODO_00<tab>中央ザナラーンの<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA3D01 /var>で見渡す

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_TODO_01<tab>Participate in the FATE at the Unholy Heir.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_TODO_01<tab>アンホーリーエアーのF.A.T.E.に参加して敵を討伐

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_TODO_02<tab>Wait at the designated location.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAA3E01 /var>で待機

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Cid.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_TODO_03<tab>シドと話す

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Kipih Jakkya in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_TODO_04<tab>ウルダハのキピ・ジャッキヤと話す

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_000<tab>Greetings, adventurer. I'm Kipih Jakkya, reporter for <var 1A 02 /var>The Raven<var 1A 01 /var>, Gridania's leading tabloid. I'm hoping that I can rely on your kind assistance.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_000噂好きたちの愛読誌「週刊レイヴン」って知ってる？
あたしは、そこで記者をやってるキピ・ジャッキヤよ！
よろしくね、冒険者さん。

source:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_001Greetings, adventurer! It's been a while.
...Hm? Do not tell me you've forgotten about Kipih Jakkya, reporter for The Raven?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_001ひさしぶり！
……えっ、あたしを忘れちゃったっていうの？
「週刊レイヴン」の記者、キピ・ジャッキヤよ！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_002<tab>You kindly helped me pen my feature article on the mysterious lady<var 1F /var>knight, Lightning, and I'm hoping that I can rely on you once more.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_002以前、ライトニングさんの特集でお世話になったじゃない！
まったく……！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_003<tab>You see, a certain rumor has been making its rounds of late.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_003実は、最近飛び交っているある噂について、
知っていることがあるか、聞かせてほしいの。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_004<tab>No few travelers passing through Thanalan report seeing an unusual black vehicle along with peculiar mechanical soldiers. Do you happen to know anything about them?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_004近頃、ザナラーンで目撃されると噂の、
「奇妙な黒い乗り物」と「機械仕掛けの兵士」を追っていてね。
何か、知らないかしら？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_005<tab>No? Let me tell you, then, that there is growing concern that they might be some unknown type of Garlean weaponry. Why, even the good people of Garlond Ironworks have been called upon to investigate.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_005う～ん、どうやら初耳のようね。
ガレマール帝国の新型魔導兵器なんじゃないか、
なんて噂も立っていて、心配している人も多いのよ！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_006<tab>This promises to be a most compelling story, and I intend to be the first reporter to tell it. But in order to do that, I require the contribution of good folk such as yourself.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_006ガーロンド・アイアンワークスも調査に乗り出してるこの案件、
もし最初に情報をつかめたら、スター記者間違いなし……！
何かわかったことがあったら、教えてくれないかしら？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_007<tab>Lest you wonder, the black vehicle was most recently sighted near Black Brush, in central Thanalan. Should you come into any information, I ask that you bring me word without delay!
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_007「奇妙な黒い乗り物」は、中央ザナラーンの、
ブラックブラッシュ周辺で目撃例が多いの。
もし何かわかったら、真っ先にあたしに教えてね！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_008<tab>The most recent sightings of the black vehicle took place near Black Brush, in central Thanalan. Should you come into any information, I ask that you bring me word without delay!
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_008「奇妙な黒い乗り物」は、中央ザナラーンの、
ブラックブラッシュ周辺で目撃例が多いの。
もし何かわかったら、真っ先にあたしに教えてね！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_020<tab>(-Young Man's Voice-)Gah! Why won't you move, damn it?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_020(-若そうな青年の声-)ったく！
動けっつーの……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_021<tab>(-Man in Black-)Hey, do you know if there's a garage nearby?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_021(-黒尽くめの青年-)あのさ、このあたりに
ガソリンスタンドってねーかな？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_022<tab>(-Man in Black-)<sigh> Just my luck to have a breakdown in the middle of nowhere... What is this place, anyway?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_022(-黒尽くめの青年-)はぁ、なんで誰もわかんねーんだよ。
つーか、ここどこなんだよ……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_023<tab>(-Man in Black-)Thanalan? Eorzea? That's on no map I've ever seen.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_023(-黒尽くめの青年-)ザナラーン……？　エオ……ルゼア？
どこだよそれ、聞いたことねーわ……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_024<tab>(-Man in Black-)I'm not sure how I got here, and I've got no idea where I need to go...but I'm going nowhere at this rate. Isn't there anyone around here who can fix cars?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_024(-黒尽くめの青年-)ところで、あんたの知り合いで車直せそうな人、いねーか？
壊れちまったみたいなんだ……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_A1_000_001<tab>Garlond Ironworks might be able to handle it.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_A1_000_001<tab>ガーロンド・アイアンワークスの人たちなら……

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_A1_000_002<tab>If anyone can get you moving, it'll be Cid.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_A1_000_002<tab>シドなら……

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_025<tab>(-Man in Black-)Seriously!? Man, what a relief...
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_025(-黒尽くめの青年-)おっ！
助かったぁ、もう疲れたわ……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_026<tab>(-Man in Black-)Wait, what? <var 1A 02 /var>Cid<var 1A 01 /var> is here too!? What in the world's going on...?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_026(-黒尽くめの青年-)えっ！？
シドもここに来てんのかよ！？
どうなってんだよ。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_027<tab>(-Man in Black-)Anyway, might as well keep pushing her along.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_027<tab>(-黒尽くめの青年-)とりあえず、近くまで押して運ぶしかねえか……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_028<tab>(-Man in Black-)Hey, mind giving me a hand? She's heavier than she looks.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_028(-黒尽くめの青年-)あんたも手伝ってくんねーか？
ひとりじゃ大変なんだ。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_029<tab>(-Man in Black-)What's your name, by the way?
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_029<tab>(-黒尽くめの青年-)そういや、あんた、名前は？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_030<tab>Appreciate the help, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. My name's Noctis, but you can call me Noct.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_030)) (( )) 02 /var>っていうのか、よろしくな。
オレはノクティス。
ノクトでいい……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_031<tab>And now that we're introduced, let's put our backs into it. <sigh> Talk about deja vu... Un. Believable.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_031じゃ、行くか。
つーか、また押すハメになるとか、ほんとないわ……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_GARLONDIRONWORKSEMPLOYEESA_000_032<tab>Oho, if it isn't <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_GARLONDIRONWORKSEMPLOYEESA_000_032<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんではありませんか！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_GARLONDIRONWORKSEMPLOYEESA_000_033<tab>B-By the gods, she's magnificent! Such elegance, such refinement!
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_GARLONDIRONWORKSEMPLOYEESA_000_033<tab>も、もしかして、これは噂の……！？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_GARLONDIRONWORKSEMPLOYEESA_000_034<tab>Ah, as you may have heard, we were tasked by the Alliance with investigating the mystery vehicle.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_GARLONDIRONWORKSEMPLOYEESA_000_034「奇妙な黒い乗り物」についての噂が広まったことで、
各国からガーロンド社に、調査依頼が舞い込みまして……。
この付近を調査していたのですよ。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_GARLONDIRONWORKSEMPLOYEESA_000_035<tab>Master Cid himself should be close. If you'll excuse me a moment, I will direct him hither.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_GARLONDIRONWORKSEMPLOYEESA_000_035シド会長も、すぐ近くまで来ています。
お呼びしますので、少々お待ちいただけますか？
ぜひ、お話を聞かせていただきたく……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_036<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Why am I not surprised that you're here already?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_036よぉ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
まさか、お前に先を越されるとはな……！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_037<tab>So this is the machine... At a glance, it doesn't appear to be of Garlean make.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_037なるほど、こいつが噂の……
たしかにガレマール帝国の魔導兵器とも違うようだな……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_038<tab>The young fellow there─I take it he's the owner?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_038彼が、この代物の持ち主か？
いったい何者なんだ？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_039<tab>And Noctis doesn't seem to know anything about Eorzea, you say? Peculiar...
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_039ふむ、名前はノクティス……それ以外は不明……
エオルゼアについての知識も、ほとんどない様子か……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_040<tab>Might he have lost his memories like I did?
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_040<tab>もしや、以前の俺のように、記憶を失っているとでも？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_041<tab>Hey, I'm right here, you know? Now, if you're done talking about me─you're Cid, right?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_041さっきからなんなんだよ
あんたシドっていうのか？
知ってるやつかと思ったら別人かよ……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_042<tab>Not quite the Cid I was expecting, but if you can fix the Regalia, then it's all good.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_042<tab>ところで、レガリアのこと直してくれんのか？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_043<tab>I will be honest with you: this is technology I am unfamiliar with. I can't make any promises, but I will try my best.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_043こいつはレガリアというのか……。
だが、なにせ初めて見る技術が満載だからな。
保証はできないが、全力を尽くすと約束しよう。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_044<tab>Appreciate it. There's...er, just one little problem. I don't have any money.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_044サンキュー！
ただ……整備代っつうか、カネがなくってさ……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_045<tab>Never you mind that. To be able to work on a unique machine such as this is its own reward.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_045それなら大丈夫だ。
こいつを見てたら、技術屋として燃えてきたぜ……
金はいらないさ。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_046<tab>Seriously? You're a lifesaver!
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_046<tab>マジか！　助かるわ！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_047<tab>Oh, and <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I trust you also heard about the mechanical soldiers.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_047そうだ、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
「機械仕掛けの兵士」の噂について、誰かから聞いたか？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_048<tab>We're tasked with investigating them as well. By all accounts, they appear to be simply men, albeit armored head to toe and bearing advanced firearms. What betrays them is the unnatural efficiency with which they move.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_048そっちも調査対象に含まれていてな。
妙な仮面をつけた人形で、人とは思えぬ動きで襲ってくるらしい。
何か情報を持っていればと思ったんだが……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_049<tab>Sounds like MTs to me.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_049<tab>それって……もしかして、魔導兵のことか？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_050<tab>Em-tees?
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_050<tab>魔導兵？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_051<tab>Magitek troopers. Robotic soldiers created by the Niflheim Empire.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_051あぁ。
ニフルハイム……つっても分かんねーかもしんねーけど、
そこの軍が使ってる機械の兵士だよ。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_052<tab>Come to think of it, the last thing I remember is being at a Niff base. It's kinda hazy...but there was a strange machine. And before I knew it, I was here, in this place you call Eorzea.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_052もともとそいつらの基地で、妙な装置を見つけて……
で、気づいたらコッチにいたっていうか……
オレにも何がどうなってるのか、わけわかんねぇ……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_053<tab>That's quite an unusual tale, but then again I'm in the presence of unusual technology. I have no reason to doubt your words. You may have inadvertently activated a teleportation device and been sent to our world.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_053ふむ、にわかには信じがたいが……
目の前には未知の技術体系に属す産物があるからな……。
転移装置か何かの誤作動で、異界から漂流してきたとでも？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_054<tab>At any rate, you seem to be acquainted with these mechanical soldiers. Perhaps you could investigate in our stead? They were most recently sighted near the Unholy Heir, not far to the east of here.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_054ともかく、ノクティス君とやら。
「機械仕掛けの兵士」を調べてみてはどうだ？
東のアンホーリーエアー付近で、目撃情報があるんだが。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_100_054<tab>Hmmm... If they really are MTs, they might hold some clue on how to return home...
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_100_054たしかに、そいつらが魔導兵だったら、
元の世界に戻るための手がかりになるかもな。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_055<tab>Alright, leave them to me.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_055<tab>わかった、行ってみるわ。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_056<tab>W-Wait!
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_056<tab>おい、待て！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_057<tab>It wouldn't do to leave our visitor to wander a strange land alone. Could you accompany him, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Rest assured I'll tend to the Regalia in the meantime.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_057この辺りに詳しくない彼がひとりで向かったのは、少し心配だ。
こいつの方は、なんとか直せないかやってみるから、
彼の様子を見に行ってやってくれないか？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_058<tab>Go on and follow Noctis, my friend. Rest assured I'll tend to the Regalia in the meantime.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_058この辺りに詳しくない彼がひとりで向かったのは、少し心配だ。
こいつの方は、なんとか直せないかやってみるから、
彼の様子を見に行ってやってくれないか？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_060<tab>MTs, just as I thought. And a magitek armor to boot. They must have crossed over when I did.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_060ホントに魔導兵だったわ。
あいつらもオレと一緒に、コッチに来てたってことか。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_061<tab>But I couldn't find any clues on how I might cross back. Gah, what am I supposed to do now?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_061でも、元の世界に戻れる手掛かりは何もなかった。
ったく、どうすりゃ戻れんだよ！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_Q2_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_A2_000_001<tab>Let's consult Cid.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_A2_000_001<tab>シドに相談してみては？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_A2_000_002<tab>Let's consult Kipih.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_A2_000_002<tab>キピ・ジャッキヤから情報を仕入れては？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_062<tab>That old geezer? Well, he did seem to know his stuff.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_062さっきのおっさんか。
ま、ひとりで考えててもしょうがねーしな……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_063<tab>A reporter? That's...actually not a bad idea. She's bound to have loads of connections.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_063雑誌記者の知り合いがいんのか？
それ、いいかもな。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_064<tab>You're coming along, right? Let's go check in on the Regalia.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_064<tab>ま、とりあえずレガリアんとこ戻ってみるか。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_100_070<tab>So, how fared you? Were you able to find the mechanical soldiers?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_100_070どうだ？
「機械仕掛けの兵士」には出会えたか？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_110_070<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>fought<var 1A 01 /var> them!? So the rumors were true...
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_110_070なに、「機械仕掛けの兵士」と一戦交えたと！？
噂は真実だったのか……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_120_070<tab>That being the case, I would very much like to examine the technology with my own eyes.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_120_070……となると、どんな技術や材質が利用されているか、
この目で見てみたいものだな。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、頼みがある。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_130_070<tab>I have a favor to ask, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The next time you encounter these soldiers, could you salvage their parts?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_130_070もし、またそいつらと遭遇して、
部品の類を手に入れられたら、持ってきてくれないか？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_GARLONDIRONWORKSRESEARCHER03158_140_070<tab>Ahem! <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, may I ask that you bring said parts to either myself or my colleagues in the three city-states?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_GARLONDIRONWORKSRESEARCHER03158_140_070でしたら、部品を入手できた際には、私か、
エオルゼア三都市にいる、弊社の調査員に渡していただけますか？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_GARLONDIRONWORKSRESEARCHER03158_150_070<tab>We will pass them along to the chief─<var 1A 02 /var>after<var 1A 01 /var> he has completed his long list of outstanding tasks!
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_GARLONDIRONWORKSRESEARCHER03158_150_070シド会長！
会長は、レガリアの修復はもちろん、溜まりに溜まっている、
業務を片付けるのを、最優先でお願いしますよっ！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_070<tab>Hey, where's my car?
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_070<tab>あれ……レガリアは？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_071<tab>Don't worry, she's in a safe place. A reporter came sniffing about while you were away, so I decided to move her to the Dispatch Yard that we might carry out the repairs undisturbed.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_071安心してくれ、場所を移しただけさ。
すでに、おおよその故障箇所も突き止めはした。
ただ、交換部品をイチから作るためには、時間がかかる。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_072<tab>I'm pleased to say I was able to identify the problem, and I believe it can be fixed. However, it may take some time to fashion the replacement part.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_072それに、噂を嗅ぎつけたゴシップ誌の記者が現れてな。
あれこれ作業の邪魔なもんで、ウルダハ操車庫を間借りして、
人目につかない場所で、修理することにしたんだ。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_073<tab>I see. That's good to know.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_073そういうことか。
ならいいんだ、どうもな。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_074<tab>(-Woman's Voice-)<gasp> You must be the mystery man!
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_074<tab>(-甲高い女性の声-)あなたが噂の！？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_075<tab>Ooh, I'm no fashion correspondent, but I like your look! A simple silhouette with an emphasis on the details!
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_075<tab>なかなか、斬新な格好をされてるんですねぇ～！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_076<tab>What's the deal with you?
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_076<tab>なんだよ、あんた。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_077<tab>Ah, where are my manners? Kipih Jakkya, reporter for <var 1A 02 /var>The Raven<var 1A 01 /var>, at your service!
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_077あっ、申し遅れました！
「週刊レイヴン」の記者の、キピ・ジャッキヤといいます！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_078<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> the owner of the mysterious black vehicle, yes?
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_078<tab>「奇妙な黒い乗り物」の運転手さんで間違いありませんか？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_079<tab>What, you mean the Regalia?
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_079<tab>それって……レガリアのことか？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_080<tab>The Rega... I beg your pardon?
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_080<tab>レ……レガ……なんです？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_081<tab>Re-ga-lia.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_081<tab>レ・ガ・リ・ア。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_082<tab>Ah, so that's what she's called! A stately name!
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_082<tab>なるほど、例の乗り物はレガリアという名前なのですね！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_083<tab>She's like nothing anyone has ever seen in Eorzea. May I ask where you hail from and how you came to be here?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_083続けて、どんどん取材しちゃいますよ！
レガリアの運転手さん、あなたはどちらからいらしたのですか？
エオルゼアでは見たことのない乗り物でしたが……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_084<tab>I'm from...far away. I was on a journey. We were fighting. Then suddenly I was here.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_084よくわかんねーんだけど、旅してて、戦い終わって……
で、気づいたらここに来ててさ。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_085<tab>I really need to find my way back. There's so much I have to do...
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_085さっさと戻んねーと……
やらなきゃいけないことがあんのに……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_086<tab>A mysterious young man, come from another world, desperately seeking a way home... A promising premise! Now then, may I ask what manner of journey you were on?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_086むむっ、異世界からやってきた青年、っと……！
ちなみに、どういった旅の最中だったのですか？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_087<tab>Well, I was traveling with my friends. We were on our way to meet...someone important to me.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_087<tab>いや、ちょっと大事な人と会うために、仲間たちとさ……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_088<tab>Someone <var 1A 02 /var>important<var 1A 01 /var> to you? Could you please elaborate on the nature of your relationship with this individual?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_088待ち合わせ……？　どんな関係の方と……？
仲間というのは、何人で……？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_089<tab>H-Hold on just a second. You're not the only one with questions, you know. I've got loads of my own.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_089ちょっと待てって！
あんた、記者なんだったら、ちょっと協力してくんねーか？
こっちも情報が足りなくて困ってんだよ。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_090<tab>Well, sir, <var 1A 02 /var>The Raven<var 1A 01 /var> has many eyes and ears, and I would be happy to call upon them all for the answers you seek─if you'll agree to grant me an exclusive interview!
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_090ええ、もちろんです！
「週刊レイヴン」の情報網を、どーんとお貸ししちゃいましょう！
……ただし、取材はあたしに独占させてくださいねっ♪

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_091<tab>Yeah, sure, whatever.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_091<tab>お好きにどーぞ。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_092<tab>Then it's settled! If you would accompany me to Ul'dah, we may continue our conversation while I put my connections to work.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_092それなら、こんな場所で立ち話も何ですから、
ウルダハにて、いろいろと詳しく聞かせていただけますか！？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_093<tab>Whew... That wasn't an interview─it was an <var 1A 02 /var>interrogation<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_093<tab>いろいろ聞かれまくって疲れたわ……。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_094<tab>I'll begin working on the replacement part for the Regalia, but it will take a while. Feel free to go about your own business in the meantime.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_CID_000_094すでに、おおよその故障箇所も突き止めはしたが、
交換部品をイチから作るためには、時間がかかる。
しばらく待っていてくれ。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_100<tab>Noctis was very cooperative, and I have lots of juicy morsels for my feature article. Lest you wonder, he was on his way to meet his beloved fiancée.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_100ノクティスさんの独占インタビューは大成功！
なんと、婚約者さんに会いに行く途中だったんだとか！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_101<tab>Will the two sweethearts be reunited? With such a timeless tale of romance, the next edition of <var 1A 02 /var>The Raven<var 1A 01 /var> is certain to fly off the stands!
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_101異世界からやってきた青年、婚約者との感動の再会なるか！？
うん、一面スクープ間違いなしね！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_102<tab>C-Come now, don't look at me so. It's been so long since I last graced the front page. And as promised, I will help Noctis find the answers he seeks.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_102……そ、そんな目で見ないでよ、
あたしだって、たまには一面を飾りたいの！
それに、情報提供だって、しっかりやってみせるんだからっ！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_103<tab>I've already put the word out to my colleagues, and I expect to hear back from them any moment now.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_103すでに、記者仲間に情報があったら、
連絡してくれるようにお願いしたところよ。
何か掴めればいいんだけど……。

source:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_104Ah, speak of the devil!
...Yes, Kipih here. What do you have for me?
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_104えぇ、あたしよ。
何か分かった？

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_105<tab>...Truly!? Thank you so much!
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_105……えっ、本当に！？
ありがとう、助かったわ！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_106<tab>See, what did I tell you? We have a hopeful lead!
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_106冒険者さん、やったわ！
記者仲間から、有力な情報が舞い込んだの！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_107<tab>We'll need to take a little trip together, the three of us. See to your preparations and let me know when you're ready to depart!
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_KIPIHJAKKYA_000_107ちょっと遠出をすることになるから、
準備ができたら教えてくれる？
ノクティスさんと一緒に、向かうことにしましょ！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SYSTEM_100_107<tab>The FATE “Like Clockwork” will appear at the Clutch in central Thanalan over the course of the seasonal event.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SYSTEM_100_107中央ザナラーンのクラッチ狭間では、イベント開催期間中、
F.A.T.E.『機械仕掛けの兵士』が発生しています。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SYSTEM_110_107<tab>Completing this FATE will reward players with pieces of unidentified magitek.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SYSTEM_110_107F.A.T.E.『機械仕掛けの兵士』に参加し、
一定以上の貢献をすることで、
「」を入手できます。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SYSTEM_120_107<tab>These items may be exchanged for various goods by speaking with an Ironworks hand.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SYSTEM_120_107「」は、
「ガーロンド社の調査員」に渡すことで、
様々なアイテムと交換できます。

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SYSTEM_130_107<tab>Ironworks hands are posted at Black Brush and in each of the three city-states.
target:
TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_SYSTEM_130_107「ガーロンド社の調査員」は、
ブラックブラッシュ停留所か、エオルゼア三都市にいます。
「」を集め、アイテムの獲得を目指しましょう！

source: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_108<tab>
target: TEXT_FESBKC001_03158_NOCTIS_000_108<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
